messages.title: We need a LOCAL champion
messages.content: With a change in government widely expected following the General Election this year, local people have a choice.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: LIBERAL DEMOCRATS are promising a £700 cut in income tax of £700 a year benefiting thousands of families and pensioners in Bournemouth and Poole.
The British political system is broken. The Lib Dems are the only part committed to root and branch reform of the political system.
Local Lib Dems are backing plans which will make homes warmer, cut energy bills and improve public transport to stop the govt. harmful policies towards our children and grandchildren.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair start for all children
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Local Lib Dems pledged to put children first as the Con Council slashes its pupil numbers by 2000. 'Extra spending will pay for more teachers and smaller classes.'

mentions.candidate: Lisa Northover has a record of hard work as a tough and respected councillor.

issues.education: Extra spending will pay for more teachers and smaller classes.
issues.environment: Local Lib Dems are backing plans which will make homes warmer, cut energy bills and improve public transport to stop the govt. harmful policies towards our children and grandchildren.
issues.governance: The British political system is broken. For far too long is broken. The Lib Dems are the only part committed to root and branch reform of the political system.

housing.content: Local Lib Dems are backing plans which will make homes warmer.

politicalExperience.role: Liberal Democrat Councillor in the town
politicalExperience.achievements: Lisa grew up in bournemouth, went to local schools, and lives here with her family.

contactInformation.address: Bournemouth Liberal Democrats, Freepost RLSU-HZUL-EGXJ, Kinson, Bournemouth BH10 6BW.

endorsements.endorsement: I strongly support Lisa's campaign and appeal to Lib Dem supporters in Bournemouth to get behind her so that we can have a Lib Dem MP in the town.

quotes.text: I'm a Lib Dem because I believe in fairness & honesty

images.caption: Lisa Northover visiting New Earth Solutions: Dorset's pioneering recycling centre

leaflet.additionalNotes: 5 reasons why Lisa should win in Bournemouth East: 1. Local issues and Education. Lisa lives East - and would be Bournemouth East's first woman MP. 2. Economy - £700 tax cut for every family. 3. Just 269 votes needed to get Lisa elected as your MP!. 4. Trust. If Conservatives couldn't win with that lead we would be UK's Lab/Lib Dem swing. 5. We want a local MP like Lisa
